items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight wrap for cool buildings
items.body: I actually got this for my father who is 90 and usually in a wheelchair. Its too hard to get his arms in and out of a jacket because his mobility is limited. This works great for a light cover because he gets chilled in the air conditioning and its easy to take on and off of him. I was worried it might look feminine, but its brown and plaid so a little old man can get by with it. The back is kind of short when you're wearing it, but for us that's perfect because he is always sitting down. This style is good for people in a wheelchair because of that, its not all bulky in the back and there's nothing to sit on. My dad calls it "his wrap". Kinda plasticky but serves our purpose and I'm happy with it. Read more
items.author: Myrtle P

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, larger than expected, but nice quality
items.body: I bought the red one and the navy blue one to go over dresses and sweaters. I LOVE the toggle and the hood; that was why I bought these and not just plain plaid scarves. The navy blue one was softer out of the packaging than the red one--in fact, the red one was scratchy enough that I washed it twice with lots of fabric softener and now it's fine. They are definitely large enough to come down to the waist, and your arms will be entirely covered unless you have extremely long arms. This wasn't quite what I had in mind, but I wore the navy blue one out in the rain recently and it was quite nice having it be longer than I thought. It also kept me warm and dry, so that's a bonus. Definitely recommend. They look very high quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Jennie M.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great poncho BUT short in the back....
items.body: Great poncho with button toggle to hold it on, has the hat you can put over your head easily if needed.....BUT the back of the poncho falls way too short!!!.. If you like your arms covered but your back exposed just below your shoulder blade area, this poncho will work for you. I like my poncho/shawls to at least come down to below waist area so this one just is okay for me. It is great design and made well, would work for shorter person probably. I am 5'6", just average female height in the USA. We love to be outside and camp a lot, so I have many ponchos and shawls. I was looking forward to finally having one with a hat to pull on, but this one will be given to one of my preteen grandkids. I would like to mention also it is a thin material for those that would like to know. Made very well, thin material, toggle button to keep on, hat if needed, BUT very short in back of poncho. Read more
items.author: Sherry Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Stewart Plaid. Decorative and warm but light for fall weather
items.body: Light poncho/cape ...adds to warmth if used over coat in cold weather Read more
items.author: Norma Jennings

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars A rectangle with a hood attached
items.body: This is definitely not worth the money. It is a thin piece of material, a rectangle with a hood attached. About the best feature is the closure. I can't imagine an outing where this item would come in handy, because it is not comfortable enough to wear next to your bare skin on a warmish day with a breeze, and not sturdy enough to want to use on a cool day. I washed it, so I will not be returning it, but I am very disappointed. Read more
items.author: Mail order fan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for fall and cold winter. Very comfy and soft
items.body: The hood is a little more pointed than I like, but I love it. It is a great length. I am 6ft tall, 161 pounds, and this fit me perfectly. With my arms down, the sides cover them like a sleeve, but do not restrict movements in any way. Nice material, not overly heavy. Would be good for those bone chilling winter days with low wind, or light wind and snow flurries. Perfect to wear if you are dressed up, like a caplet. I fully recommend all the people oout there that get cold at 72 degrees to get this. Read more
items.author: Viraga

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Short in back and cheap material
items.body: Iâ€™m disappointed ðŸ˜” I research the size of this and seem to think it would be long all the way around. But it seems they lost the way when they got to the back of the poncho. Itâ€™s so much shorter and I was like what in the world. I thought it would be better material and itâ€™s cheaply made. Iâ€™m not impressed at all. I contemplating sending it back Read more
items.author: megan

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Series 2 Maroon, Series 3 Black, Series 3 Grey, Series 4 Red, Series 3 Wine Red, Series 2 Green, Series 2 Red, Series 2 Camel, Series 4 Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
